channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping, 6th October
item.description:
Flytipped rubbish in alley way

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kentish Way, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing green bins, 6th October
item.description:
En route to work every morning I have to cross to opposite side of road as green bins outside of businesses/homes on hill reach take up most of the pavement. Apart from being a nuisance it is a health hazard & rarely seems cleared.... Infact I work for charlton park academy just up the hill , & we haven't had bins collected for 3 weeks now, complaint has been made to RBG.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-2, Hill Reach, Charlton Riverside, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping at the end of Dewar Street, 6th October
item.description:
Fly tipped sofa at end of Dewar Street, behind 68 Peckham Rye. Restricting entrance to bin store for neighbouring block.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dewar Street, London

item.title: Fly tipping in front of ano flying tipping poster, 6th October
item.description:
Pile of discarded furniture underneath under a 'no fly tipping sign' this is on side of len clifton house, where I live.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rushgrove Street, Charlton Riverside, London

item.title: Furniture blocking the pavement, 6th October
item.description:
This pile of furniture has been in the street for weeks. It's blocking half the pavement make it difficult for people to walk past it especially those with a pram .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chancelot Road, Abbey Wood, London

item.title: Resident moved out and left rubbish, 6th October
item.description:
The resident moved out and has left seats, and a fridge freezer out on the pavement along with others bits and pieces. It is blocking the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chancelot Road, Abbey Wood, London

item.title: Road still closed but the works were finished last week, 6th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Davies Street, Mayfair, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The tree on 240 Blackfriars Road is damaged, 6th October
item.description:
The tree on 240 Blackfriars Road at the location with the pin has a broken branch that seems like it is about to fall off. The branch is almost level to the top of the lamppost right next to it. It was spotted at around 2pm on 06/10/2025 from inside the office building. If it falls its fall might be softened by the branches below but it seems like if it corresponds with a passer by that it could cause injury.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 240, Blackfriars Road, Southwark, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves off trees, 6th October
item.description:
The leaves on our green, at this time of year blow onto my drive. I do not have a brown bin as too expensive, and have to bag it up take it to the dump. I bagged up 2 black bin bags at the weekend. There are plenty more leaves to shed yet, this is a bit unfair on me to be honest. Is there anyway to have it collected or a brown bin allocated free off charge? Thanks I have attached pictures.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cuxton Close, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southlands Road, Bickley, London
